This vignette demonstrates using `fastml` for a simple survival analysis task
with the `lung` dataset from the `survival` package.

```{r}
library(fastml)
library(survival)

head(cancer)

set.seed(42)
model <- fastml(
  data = cancer,
  label = c("time", "status"),
  algorithms = "rand_forest",
  task = "survival",
  test_size = 0.3
)

model$performance
```
